website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Alteration Kurve was designed to give a glimpse of Puma’s history while evolving into a modern world. This dad sneaker successfully combined a futuristic look with straightforward details.Many have shared their praises for this pair’s comfortable, premium construction, and breathability. This model is an excellent addition to any dad sneaker collection without ripping anyone’s budget.
pros: Most buyers share that the Puma Alteration Kurve is constructed with premium materials
Several users have cited that they love how comfortable this sneaker is
The color combinations used by Puma are fashionable and noteworthy, according to numerous buyers
It is breathable, according to a handful of wearers
This model from Puma sneakers fits true to size
A couple of users consider this sneaker as the cheap alternative to the pricey Adidas Yeezy 500
cons: A user complains that the Puma Alteration Kurve is a tad tight on the toe box
A couple of critics consider this model as heavy

customer_reviews.title: When you hold it in your hand, its heavy but you can feel how Authentic it is
customer_reviews.text: From the moment i opened the Box i knew i wouldn't want to wear them because they might get dirty lol. This shoe is different, Puma really did a good job with the colors for this version of the shoe. The materials feel amazing and it's very comfortable on my feet. I'll reccomend this shoes to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Zoran C.

customer_reviews.title: So awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are so dope. Don’t ever believe an amazon review telling you how sizing is. People are all different. That being said. I ordered a half size up from my usual size 11 and the shape of this shoe makes them fit slightly smaller than what I expected. Again, my feet are not like your feet and this may not apply to you but perhaps play it safe and go a half size bigger than your usual?
customer_reviews.author: Boss Haus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! From the first view, they feel breathable. Upper mesh thinner than spectra and they lighter than puma thunder spectra.
customer_reviews.author: Philipp

customer_reviews.title: very stylish and love the varied colors
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, can walk miles and always feeling comfortable. easy on the feet
customer_reviews.author: tennischamp

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and casual
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes, I always order puma a sizes up. I wear 91/2 but I ordered 101/2. And they fit good. They look a little big but nice.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 9.5. Recieved a box that says 8.5 but shoe tag says 9.5. Too small not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: b. wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fit exactly as it should
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected. Looks so much better in person too.
customer_reviews.author: jody4president

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied than a mf!
customer_reviews.text: Received my order a day early! Sneakers came in perfect condition and fit true to size, unlike the RS-X collection you don’t have to go a size up in these if not necessary. I remember these were 150$ last year! So the price was perfect. SHOEBACCA and Amazon have one very satisfied customer, Thank u!!
customer_reviews.author: Tattu.C

customer_reviews.title: great for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes but it's defiantly for a narrow feet
customer_reviews.author: livio Angileri

customer_reviews.title: Take a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great snickers! I love it Usually I'm wearing 11 but I got 11,5 and it fits perfectly Great seller and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy half size up
customer_reviews.text: A little tight, but half size up, other then that I enjoy them
customer_reviews.author: Z Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: You have to buy these a half size or full size bigger. They run small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PUMA mens 369794-02 Alteration Kurve
product_meta.description:
* The PUMA® Alteration Kurve sneaker sports a low-top retro design in a leather and mesh upper.
 * Lace-up closure.
 * Round-toe construction.
 * Soft fabric lining and footbed.
 * Rubber outsole.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements:  *  Weight: 1 lb 2 oz
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Fits true to size, order your normal size
Sneaker with Formstrip overlay featuring lace-up vamp
Formstrips featuring brand callouts on heel, tongue, and side
Sculpted, layered midsole design provides midfoot support through the heel
